title: Base Taxonomy Node
description: Defines the structure for a single node within any given taxonomy.

id.description: The unique ID for this node within its level (e.g., 'simple', 'individual', 'sleep').

level.description: The name of the taxonomy level this node belongs to (e.g., 'cognitive_complexity').

description.title: Description Field
description.description: A canonical, reusable definition for a human-readable description field.

embedding_context.description: OPTIONAL: Rich text fed into a Sentence Transformer to generate the canonical embedding for this concept. Omit for rule-based classifications.

metadata.description: Optional key-value metadata for this node, such as a physics profile affinity or rule-based triggers.
metadata.title: BaseTaxonomyNodeMetadata
